Articles.Content:
Suggestion:

I think the effect of the flame flume should be scalable in relation to the size of the rocket! Right now it’s really immersion breaking. 

Bug:

also when you (accidentally) place a jet vertically on the rocket launch pad, the effect still goes off!

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/1079031824648511631/1079031824992448542/20230225114145_2.jpg
